Verses: 1 andha Vaadhai Theerndhapinbu, Karththar Moseyaiyum Aaronin Kumaaranum Aasaariyanumaagiya Eleyaasaaraiyum Nokki:

2 isravel Puththirarin Samastha Sabaiyaaraiyum Avargal Pidhaakkaludaiya Vamsaththinpadi Irubadhu Vayadhumudhal Adharku Merpatta Isravelile Yuththathirkup Purappadaththakkavargal Ellaaraiyum Ennungal Endraar.
3 appozhudhu Moseyum Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarum Erigovin Aruge Irukkum Yordhaanukku Ippaale Movaapin Samanaana Veligalile Avargalode Pesi:
4 karththar Mosekkum Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappatta Isravel Puththirarukkum Kattalaiyittirukkirapadiye, Irubadhu Vayadhumudharkondirukkiravargalai Ennungal Endraargal.
5 rooban Isravelin Mooththa Kumaaran; Roobanudaiya Kumaarar, Aanaakkiyar Kudumbaththukkuth Thagappanaana Aanokkum, Pallooviyar Kudumbaththukkuth Thagappanaana Palloovum,
6 esroniyar Kudumbaththukkuth Thagappanaana Esronum, Karmeeyar Kudumbaththukkuth Thagappanaana Karmeeyume.
7 ivaigale Roobaniyarin Kudumbangal; Avargalil Ennappattavargal Naarpaththu Moovaayiraththu Ezhunootru Muppadhuper.
8 palloovin Kumaaran Eliyaap.

9 eliyaapin Kumaarar Nemuvel, Thaaththaan, Apraam Enbavargal; Indhath Thaaththaan Apraam Enbavargale Sabaiyil Perpetravargalaayirundhu, Karththarukku Virodhamaagap Poraattam Panni, Koraakin Koottaaligalaaki, Mosekkum Aaronukkum Virodhamaaga Vivaadhampanninavargal.
10 boomi Than Vaayaith Thirandhu, Avargalaiyum Koraagaiyum Vizhunginadhinaalum, Akkini Irunootru Aimbadhu Peraip Patchiththadhinaalum, Andhak Koottaththaar Seththu, Oru Adaiyaalamaanaargal.
11 koraakin Kumaararo Saagavillai.
12 simiyonudaiya Kumaararin Kudumbangalaavana: Nemuvelin Sandhadhiyaana Nemuvelarin Kudumbamum, Yaaminin Sandhadhiyaana Yaaminiyarin Kudumbamum, Yaakeenin Sandhadhiyaana Yaakeeniyarin Kudumbamum,
13 seraakin Sandhadhiyaana Seraagiyarin Kudumbamum, Savulin Sandhadhiyaana Savuliyarin Kudumbamume.
14 ivaigale Simiyoniyarin Kudumbangal; Avargal Irubaththeeraayiraththu Irunooruper.
15 kaaththudaiya Kumaararin Kudumbangalaavana: Sipponin Sandhadhiyaana Sipponiyarin Kudumbamum, Aakiyin Sandhadhiyaana Aagiyarin Kudumbamum, Sooniyin Sandhadhiyaana Sooniyarin Kudumbamum,
16 osniyin Sandhadhiyaana Osniyarin Kudumbamum, Eriyin Sandhadhiyaana Eriyarin Kudumbamum,
17 aarodhin Sandhadhiyaana Aarodhiyarin Kudumbamum, Areliyin Sandhadhiyaana Areliyarin Kudumbamume.
18 ivaigale Kaadh Puththirarin Kudumbangal; Avargalil Ennappattavargal Naarpadhinaayiraththu Ainnooruper.
19 yoodhaavin Kumaarar Er Onaan Enbavargal; Erum Onaanum Kaanaan Dhesaththil Seththaargal.

20 yoodhaavudaiya Matrak Kumaararin Kudumbangalaavana: Selaavin Sandhadhiyaana Selaaviyarin Kudumbamum, Paaresin Sandhadhiyaana Paaresiyarin Kudumbamum, Seraavin Sandhadhiyaana Seraaviyarin Kudumbamume.
21 paaresudaiya Kumaararin Kudumbangalaavana: Esronin Sandhadhiyaana Esroniyarin Kudumbamum, Aamoolin Sandhadhiyaana Aamooliyarin Kudumbamume.
22 ivaigale Yoodhaavin Kudumbangal; Avargalil Ennappattavargal Ezhubaththaaraayiraththu Ainnooruper.
23 isakkaarudaiya Kumaararin Kudumbangalaavana: Tholaavin Sandhadhiyaana Tholaaviyarin Kudumbamum, Poovaavin Sandhadhiyaana Poovaaviyarin Kudumbamum,
24 yaasoopin Sandhadhiyaana Yaasoopiyarin Kudumbamum, Simronin Sandhadhiyaana Simroniyarin Kudumbamume.
25 ivaigale Isakkaarin Kudumbangal; Avargalil Ennappattavargal Arubaththu Naalaayiraththu Munnooruper.
26 sepulonudaiya Kumaararin Kudumbangalaavana: Sereththin Sandhadhiyaana Sereththiyarin Kudumbamum, Elonin Sandhadhiyaana Eloniyarin Kudumbamum, Yaaleyelin Sandhadhiyaana Yaaleyeliyarin Kudumbamume.
27 ivaigale Sepuloniyarin Kudumbangal; Avargalil Ennappattavargal Arubadhinaayiraththu Ainnooruper.
28 yoseppudaiya Kumaararaana Manaase Eppraayeem Enbavargalin Kudumbangalaavana:
29 manaaseyinudaiya Kumaararin Kudumbangal: Maakeerin Sandhadhiyaana Maakeeriyarin Kudumbamum, Maakeer Petra Kileyaadhin Sandhadhiyaana Kileyaadhiyarin Kudumbamum,
30 kileyaadh Petra Eeyeserin Sandhadhiyaana Eeyeseyarin Kudumbamum, Elekkin Sandhadhiyaana Elekkiyarin Kudumbamum,
31 asriyelin Sandhadhiyaana Asriyelarin Kudumbamum, Sekemin Sandhadhiyaana Sekemiyarin Kudumbamum,
32 semeedhaavin Sandhadhiyaana Semeedhaaviyarin Kudumbamum, Epperin Sandhadhiyaana Epperiyarin Kudumbamume.
33 epperin Kumaaranaana Seloppiyaaththirkuk Kumaarar Illaamal Irundhaargal, Kumaaraththigal Maaththiram Irundhaargal; Ivargal Naamangal Maklaal, Novaal, Oklaal, Milkaal, Thirsaal Enbavaigal.
34 ivaigale Manaaseyin Kudumbangal; Avargalil Ennappattavargal Aimbaththeeraayiraththu Ezhunooruper.

35 eppraayeemudaiya Kumaararin Kudumbangalaavana: Suththelaakin Sandhadhiyaana Suththelaagiyarin Kudumbamum, Pekerin Sandhadhiyaana Pekeriyarin Kudumbamum, Thaagaanin Sandhadhiyaana Thaagaaniyarin Kudumbamum,
36 suththelaak Petra Eraanin Sandhadhiyaana Eraaniyarin Kudumbamume.
37 ivaigale Eppraayeem Puththirarin Kudumbangal; Avargalil Ennappattavargal Muppaththeeraayiraththu Ainnooruper; Ivargale Yoseppu Puththirarin Kudumbangal.
38 benyameenudaiya Kumaararin Kudumbangalaavana: Pelaavin Sandhadhiyaana Pelaaviyarin Kudumbamum, Aspelin Sandhadhiyaana Aspeliyarin Kudumbamum, Akiraamin Sandhadhiyaana Akiraamiyarin Kudumbamum,
39 suppaamin Sandhadhiyaana Suppaamiyarin Kudumbamum, Uppaamin Sandhadhiyaana Uppaamiyarin Kudumbamum,
40 pelaa Petra Aaredhin Sandhadhiyaana Aaredhiyarin Kudumbamum, Naagamaanin Sandhadhiyaana Naagamaaniyarin Kudumbamume.
41 ivaigale Benyameen Puththirarin Kudumbangal; Avargalil Ennappattavargal Naarpaththaiyaayiraththu Arunooruper.
42 thaanudaiya Kumaararin Kudumbangalaavana: Sookaamin Sandhadhiyaana Sookaamiyarin Kudumbamume; Ivaigal Thaanin Kudumbam.
43 sookaamiyarin Vamsangalil Ennappattavargal Ellorum Arubaththu Naalaayiraththu Naanooruper.
44 aaserudaiya Kumaararin Kudumbangalaavana: Imnaavin Sandhadhiyaana Imnaaviyarin Kudumbamum, Isviyin Sandhadhiyaana Isviyarin Kudumbamum, Pereeyaavin Sandhadhiyaana Pereeyaaviyarin Kudumbamum,
45 pereeyaa Petra Eperin Sandhadhiyaana Eperiyarin Kudumbamum, Malkiyelin Sandhadhiyaana Malkiyeliyarin Kudumbamume,
46 aaserudaiya Kumaaraththiyin Per Saaraal.
47 ivaigale Aaser Puththirarin Kudumbangal; Avargalil Ennappattavargal Aimbaththu Moovaayiraththu Naanooruper.
48 napthaliyinudaiya Kumaararin Kudumbangalaavana: Yaadhsiyelin Sandhadhiyaana Yaadhsiyeliyarin Kudumbamum, Kooniyin Sandhadhiyaana Kooniyarin Kudumbamum,
49 edhserin Sandhadhiyaana Edhseriyarin Kudumbamum, Sillemin Sandhadhiyaana Sillemiyarin Kudumbamume.
50 ivaigale Napthaliyin Kudumbangal; Avargalil Ennappattavargal Naarpaththaiyaayiraththu Naanooruper.
51 isravel Puththiraril Ennappattavargal Aarulatchaththoraayiraththu Ezhunootru Muppadhuperaayirundhaargal.
52 karththar Moseyai Nokki:
53 ivargaludaiya Pergalin Ilakkaththirkuththakkadhaai Dhesam Ivargalukku Sudhandharamaagap Pangidappadavendum.
54 anegamperukku Adhiga Sudhandhiramum Konjamperukku Konja Sudhandharamum Koduppaayaaga; Avargalil Ennappatta Ilakkaththirkuth Thakkadhaaga Avaravargalukku Sudhandhiram Kodukkappadavendum.
55 aanaalum Seettuppottu, Dhesaththaip Pangidavendum; Thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Koththirangalukkuriya Naamangalinpadiye Sudhandhariththukkollakkadavargal.
56 anegampergalaayinum Konjampergalaayinum Seettu Vizhundhapadiye Avaravargaludaiya Sudhandharangal Pangidappadavendum Endraar.
57 ennappatta Leviyarin Kudumbangalaavana: Kersonin Sandhadhiyaana Kersoniyarin Kudumbamum, Kokaaththin Sandhadhiyaana Kokaaththiyarin Kudumbamum, Meraariyin Sandhadhiyaana Meraariyarin Kudumbamum;
58 leviyin Matrak Kudumbangalaagiya Lipneeyarin Kudumbamum, Eproniyarin Kudumbamum, Makaliyarin Kudumbamum, Moosiyarin Kudumbamum, Koraagiyarin Kudumbamume. Kokaadh Amraamaip Petraan.
59 amraamudaiya Manaivikku Yokepedh Endru Per; Aval Egipthile Levikkup Pirandha Kumaaraththi; Aval Amraamukku Aaronaiyum Moseyaiyum Avargal Sagodhariyaana Miriyaamaiyum Petraal.
60 aaronukku Naadhaapum Apiyoovum Eleyaasaarum Iththaamaarum Pirandhaargal.
61 naadhaapum Apiyoovum Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Anniya Akkiniyaik Konduvandhapodhu, Seththupponaargal.

62 avargalil Oru Maadhaththu Aanpillai Mudhalaaga Ennappattavargal Irubaththu Moovaayiramper; Isravel Puththirarin Naduve Avargalukku Sudhandharam Kodukkappadaadhapadiyinaal, Avargal Isravel Puththirarin Ilakkaththirku Utpadavillai.
63 moseyum Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasarum Erigovin Arugeyirukkum Yordhaanukku Ippaale Movaapin Samanaana Veligalil Isravel Puththirarai Ennugirapodhu Irundhavargal Ivargale.
64 munbu Moseyum Aasaariyanaagiya Aaronum Seenaai Vanaandharaththil Isravel Puththirarai Ennumpodhu Irundhavargalil Oruvarum Ivargalukkul Illai.

65 vanaandharaththil Saagave Saavaargal Endru Karththar Avargalaik Kuriththu Solliyirundhaar; Eppunneyin Kumaaranaagiya Kaalepum Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaavum Thavira, Veroruvarum Avargalil Meedhiyaayirukkavillai.
